description: Grants the user the ability to split their own body into pieces and levitate said pieces at will. The user becomes immune to all slashing and cutting attacks as their body can separate before being cut. The separated body parts can be controlled independently within a certain range.

users.circumstances: Buggy accidentally ate the Bara Bara no Mi while he was a member of the Roger Pirates (backstory revealed in later episodes).

abilityReveals.description: The user separates their body into multiple pieces and controls them independently. The separated parts can fly and attack from unexpected angles.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Buggy's severed hand stabs Zoro from behind after Zoro thought he had defeated him by cutting off his limbs.

abilityReveals.description: The user can voluntarily split their body into pieces and reattach them at will.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Buggy demonstrates this by reattaching his hand and leg after Zoro cuts them off.

abilityReveals.description: The user is completely immune to slashing and cutting attacks as their body can separate before being damaged.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Zoro's sword attacks are ineffective against Buggy because he can split his body to avoid damage.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim and weakness to seawater
Body parts can only be controlled within a certain radius from the feet
The feet cannot fly - they remain grounded

strengths.description: Makes the user virtually invincible against swordsmen and blade-based attacks.
Body parts can attack from multiple angles simultaneously, making the user's movements hard to predict and defend against.
The ability to separate body parts allows for creative combat strategies and surprise attacks.
